Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
Created form Hein Ferman
19.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Changed IBAN/Bankaccount number on screen, removed BankID
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
03.03.2008 SH SCR9302 Reduced argument list of GM100
17.04.2007 SH SCR12313 I added BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTS to screen
06.04.2005 SH SCR8055 Added button '<' '>' and selection criteria v.Date
to select the payments for the previous/next BADT row
//07.07.2004 EE SCR#6580 activated left print button and print a report
10.05.2004 SH SCR6184 Extended CND to perform GM101 with "and BADP_INTERCREDIT=Y
//02.04.2004 EE SCR#5873 changed behaviour of table(child window)
on 17.9.2003 SCR4159 implemented by Jin
31.07.2003 SH SCR3879 Changed only CenterScreenInOnline to 'Y' if default = 'N'
20.05.2003 SH SCR3577 Set "CenterScreenInOnline = Y" to ini if screen started
- and locate cursor to current row onyl if the lacate virtual > 0
06.05.2003 SH SCR3449 If BADP_JOURNALNO > 0 GM101 will be called now if
- button "How booked" was activated
30.04.2003 SH SCR3244 Position cursor on current row if one of the subprograms
27.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
30.01.2003 SCR1793 SH/RR Add argument to GM100 (see SPECS)
02.10.2002 SCR2204 Add new button "Document" --> Call GM100
24.07.2002 SCR1683 If more than 4 BDPD rows exist show (+) at the button of
- the second screen and if user klicked on this screen show enlarged screen
-- 17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH Add new parameter "PI.BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER" to obtain
-- table BADP and table BADT with primary key
-- 21.05.2002 SH SCR1223 Add parameter PI.BADP_ID, only relevant if OPH106C
- called from ODC007, need to locate on a special payment
-- SCR#725 --> 31.01.2002 SH (Wrong Parameters by calling OPH202E)
-- SCR#726 --> 31.01.2002 SH (Repleaced data on screen)
-- only used for call from OPH203A/OPH203B/OPH204
-- only relevant if OPH106C was called from ODC007, need to locate
-- If OPH106C is called from OPH203A then PI.BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER
-- could be > 0
-- uses to call OPH202E
-- uses to call OPH101C
-- uses for RANGE on BADP
-- uses to LOCATE on BADP
-- uses to call GN101
-- need to display (+) on the button of the descrition screen, only if more than
-- 4 rows exist, display enlarged window
-- Shortcut labels
-- Initialize variables for RANGE on BADP with input parameters
-- Shortcut handling
-- Call OPH202E Payments Handled (X)
-- Call GM101 XML archive ('Y')
-- Call OPH101C Assigning payments (Z)
-- 1. Close window for descriptions --> samll window
-- 2. Open window for descriptions to position the cursor on samll/large window
-- 3. Restart window for descriptions to show the small screen
-- Start window for descriptions to show the small screen, first time
-- If users entered directly v.Date, then we try to fetch the related BADT
where BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT = v.DATE independently from
BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER
-- fetch previous BADT row in unique BADT sequence
-- if no BADTrow was selected, skip search with BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER <
current BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER and try to fetch a BADT row where
BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT < current BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT
(We have to call a secial task to fetch the BADT row where
BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT < current BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT because
of using descending SORT on BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT, see also remarks in
child task)
-- fetch next BADT row in unique BADT sequence
-- if no BADTrow was selected, skip search with BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER >
current BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER and try to fetch a BADT row where
BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT > current BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT count(*) from :1 where BDPD_BADP_ID = :2 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- Button OK
-- Button Cancle
-- Button How booked
-- Call the XML archive --> GM101
-- Call OPH202E --> Payments handled
-- Call OPH101C --> Assigning payments
-- If no BADT rows selected during first select of BADT (PI.SecondSelect=FASLE)
and PI.SearchType = 'N' (next), then we try to fetch the
next BADT row independently form BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER
-- D = previous BADT row (could be the row where BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER <
current BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER in online screen, if there exists no BADT
row then the BADT row where BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT < current
BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT in the online screen
-- N = next BADT row (could be the row where BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER >
current BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER in online screen, if there exists no BADT
row then the BADT row where BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT > current
BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT in the online screen
-- D = select BADT row if v.Date was entered in screen program, no RANGE on
BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER in this case
-- If there exists no next BADTrow, give user message and re-open
online screen without any chages according to the variables
which uses for the RANGE on BADP
-- If users enters directly v.Date in online screen and there exists no related
BADT row, give message to users and re-open online screen without
any changes on variables which uses for RANGE on BADT
-- If a previous or next BADT row exists, perform a screen refresh
-- If the users klickes on button '<' in the online screen and there eixsts
no BADT row where BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT = current
BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT from screen and BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER <
BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER from screen, then we try to fetch the previous BADT
row where BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT < BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT from screen
(We have to use this special task, because of descending SORT on
BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT; it's not possible to add a condition to
the SORT criterias, else we could use the first task where we try to fetch the
previous/next BADT row)
Maybe if a new key will be added in the future, with all key segments of the
primary key, but a descending sequence on BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT,
then we are able to extend the task "Select_Previous/Next BADT" with a
dynamically usage of different keys
-- If there exists no previous BADTrow, give user message and re-open
online screen without any chages according to the variables
which uses for the RANGE on BADP
-- If a previous BADT row exists, perform a screen refresh
